phrases: This... is not obligatory chocolate, is it?
Um... could not you just make it obligatory chocolate?
You will not accept it if it is honmei chocolate?
A First Kiss in His Room?
What does he mean by I do not know?
Look at this spot right here.
It is been a week, and it is still red.
You hit me with the corner of that box.
Are you seriously going to go around behaving like this?
You might get arrested for assault.
What is that supposed to mean?
I am the one who does not understand.
Is that any way to give someone honmei chocolate?
That happened because you said those stupid things!
I gave it a lot of thought before I responded.
But you just ignored me and threw the chocolate at me.
There was even icing in the shape of a turd on it!
I gave you a proper one later, did not I?
Then we would have to kiss.
Do not you think that is kind of comical?
Or something along those lines, right?
The next time we see each other, it will be in the courtroom!
I will sue you for slander!
They are no different from before.
I was just thinking that Otani-kun probably could not even reach Risa's lips.
It is not like that is going to happen, anyway.
That might work for you, Seiko-chan...
Say, Seiko-chan, you have kissed Otani before, right?
It is not like I wanted to kiss him anyway.
It is like your love-point level is lower than an elementary student's.
I am just a kid, of course.
Oh, then why do you want to be his girlfriend?
I mean is not it so that you can walk hand in hand..
As long as she and Otani-kun can be like...
Do not make fun of me!
Why the hell are you so damn short?!
In return for Christmas and Valentine's Day.
White Day would be too late, so I thought I would give them to you now.
I waited in line for them all morning yesterday.
We will be in the front row!
We will even be able to distinguish Umibouzu's pores.
One more time, one more time.
What if he looks right at us?
Maybe he will remember us from Hokkaido.
Maybe he will even call out to us!
The day after the graduation ceremony.
I am just a kid after all.
It is been a while since you have been on a date with just the two of you.
It is not a date or anything!
There is not much romance between...
Then make some romance, you idiot!
Are you just going to let all that effort with the honmei chocolate go to waste?
Your goal is to be a kissable girl!
It is like we have been apart for so long!
You sure have a lot of free time.
I was wondering if you were waiting to throw something at me again.
I heard he has a cold.
Why do not you pay him a little visit?
If you are nice to him in his weakened state, it will leave an impression.
For the sake of tomorrow's Umibouzu concert, you need to do your best now!
B-But I do not know where he lives...
We will tell you all you want to know, right?
I am going to go for it!
You can even do things that might result in you catching his cold.
Here are the report cards for you second-year students.
Um... I am Otani-kun's classmate, Koizumi.
He was not at school today, so, uh...
She is a beauty too, is not she?
That boy's been practically dead since this morning,
It will just be a minute, okay?
What are you doing in my house?!
Just a minute while I cut it.
You should not feed a sick person cake!
You sure are tall, are not you.
You are shorter than her, A-chan.
Mom's not scared by your shouting.
You are not even tall enough to kiss her.
She is your girlfriend, is not she?
It is your birthday today, Otani?
You should at least know the birthday of the guy you like.
It is about as bad as mine.
Some oranges to help you get better.
I am not sure if I will be okay tomorrow.
If I cannot go, then just go by yourself.
If you are not going, then I will not go either.
There is no point if I do not get to go with you.
I went to a lot of effort to get those tickets.
Then you have to come, no matter what.
I have been wanting to ask you something.
When did you start liking me?
H-How can you ask something like that?!
Did not you tell me to say whatever is on my mind?
Are not you always talking about how short I am?
Do you really want a boyfriend this short?
I am seriously going to hit you, you idiot.
It is not like you want a tall girl like me for a girlfriend either, right?
No, height has nothing to do with it.
I guess it does a little bit.
You are the one who told me not to think about height, and just go for it.
You have your own charm, Koizumi.
Of course I mind, being the only one who does not know.
Back when you did not know it was you, and you were going around asking,
Was that supposed to me be?!
My face does not look like that!
Is this how you treat the guy you like?
Please do not taunt a sick person.
I am not really as concerned with height as you think.
So it is because of my twisted personality?
If you know that, then you should do something about it.
But it would be weird if you changed all of a sudden.
The rest of the problem lies with me.
Even though the two of us are alone in this room right now, I do not feel a thing.
Sorry I forgot to give you sugar.
Uh, um, I will be leaving now!
My fever came back again last night.
Man, the last thing I remember was eating oranges.
It is all a blank after that.
What were we talking about again?
Koizumi, did you catch a cold?
Koizumi, did you catch a cold?
It is all a blank after that?
Wow, the weather sure is nice today!
All I can see right now is that guy.
Next: A Killer Crush on Maity!
